description:
The final match of the World Buddy Masters continues, as Gao deals damage to Kanata and defends his life points. When Kanata uses his new card to survive a winning blow, the tournament`s outcome hinges on his final turn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Desperate Battle Concludes! The Mirage Card Manifests!
死闘決着! ミラージュカード降臨!!
